snippet.title: Unplugged | For the Love of Rock! - Developer Update [ESRB]
snippet.description:
#unpluggedVR #airguitar #virtualreality

The team from Anotherway has some rockin' updates on Unplugged!

Coming to Oculus Quest and SteamVR* Fall 2021!

*Finger-tracking enabled PC VR hardware required to play.

VR music game Unplugged lets you play air guitar and write rock history, fully powered by finger-tracking technology. No peripherals required, just you rocking out hard to some of the biggest and loudest songs by world-famous rock bands including The Offspring and many more to be announced. Learn more about Unplugged at unplugged-vr.com!
